payload.instructions:
# Agent Notes

- To run the OS in QEMU, use `make run-hdd`.
  - Prefer this over `make run`; the HDD target is the intended path for interactive runs.
- If you run `make run-hdd`, you won't be able to continue, because the process won't finish.  If you want to run it then kill it to get serial output, run `killall qemu-system-x86_64`
- Standard build remains `make` (produces `os.img` and `hdd.img`).

Thanks!

content.text:
<user_instructions>

# Agent Notes

- To run the OS in QEMU, use `make run-hdd`.
  - Prefer this over `make run`; the HDD target is the intended path for interactive runs.
- If you run `make run-hdd`, you won't be able to continue, because the process won't finish.  If you want to run it then kill it to get serial output, run `killall qemu-system-x86_64`
- Standard build remains `make` (produces `os.img` and `hdd.img`).

Thanks!



</user_instructions>

# Context from my IDE setup:

## Active file: /Users/alex/.codex/config.toml

## Open tabs:
- stage2.asm: src/arch/x86/stage2.asm
- stage2.ld: src/arch/x86/stage2.ld
- boot.asm: src/arch/x86/boot.asm
- hwinfo.c: src/kernel/hwinfo.c
- vfs.c: src/kernel/vfs.c
- Makefile: Makefile
- config.toml: /Users/alex/.codex/config.toml
- kernel.c: src/kernel/kernel.c
- interface.c: src/net/interface.c
- cmd_net_mac.c: src/sbin/cmd_net_mac.c
- dhcp.c: src/net/dhcp.c
- dhcp.h: include/net/dhcp.h
- cmd_dhclient.c: src/sbin/cmd_dhclient.c
- AGENTS.md: AGENTS.md
- pci.h: include/pci.h
- rtl8139.c: src/drivers/rtl8139.c

## My request for Codex:
Look at the dhcp client code, and the rtl8139 implementation.  We're able to send DHCP discovery, but we're not seeing any traffic back to the card.  Here's the logs:

rtl8139: found at bus 00 device 03 function 00 io=0xC000
rtl8139: mac 52:54:00:12:34:56
NmErtl8139: tx ok
eIn-memory FS shell ready. Commands: echo, cat, mkdir, ls, ip, dhclient, start_video.
> mouse_poll draining keyboard status=0x1D data=0x20
dmouse_poll draining keyboard status=0x1D data=0x23
hmouse_poll draining keyboard status=0x1D data=0xA3
mouse_poll draining keyboard status=0x1D data=0x2E
clmouse_poll draining keyboard status=0x1D data=0xA6
iemouse_poll draining keyboard status=0x1D data=0x92
nmouse_poll draining keyboard status=0x1D data=0x14
tmouse_poll draining keyboard status=0x1D data=0x94
 rtl0
dhcp: starting discovery on interface rtl0
dhcp: transmitting message type 1
rtl8139: clearing aborted tx descriptor slot=0 tsd=0x0000A000
rtl8139: tx ok
dhcp: discover sent
DHCP discovery started for rtl0
>
